tweet.text: The October 11–12, 1986 meetings between Gorbachev and Pres. Reagan produced some of the most sweeping nuclear arms control proposals, only to be toppled by Soviet concerns over Strategic Defense Initiative (SDI) research: https://t.co/cFZlPUYmt0 (2/4) https://t.co/q90t4Jn0iZ
